intents.name: check_balance
examples: Show balance for my savings account
How much money do I have in my current account?
Can you tell me my account balance?
What's the balance in my checking account?
How much is left in my savings?
I'd like to see my account balance
What is my available balance right now?
What's the available balance in my account?
How much funds do I have in my account?
Tell me my account balance for today
Show current balance for my current account

intents.name: transfer_money
examples: Transfer funds from my savings to current account
I want to send [1000](amount) rupees to account [9876543210](account_number)
Make a transfer of [2000](amount) INR to my other account
Transfer amount [7500](amount) to my daughter's account
Please move [3000](amount) from checking to savings
I need to transfer money to someone
Transfer [1000](amount) from my savings to my current account
Can you transfer [120](amount) to my other account?

intents.name: card_block
examples: I want to block my [debit card](card_type)
How can I block a lost card?
My card is lost, please block it
Report lost [credit card](card_type) and block it
How do I freeze my card?
I think my card was stolen, block it now
Prevent transactions on my lost card
Suspend card usage for my [debit card](card_type)
Block card due to fraudulent activity
Block the card linked to account [123456](account_number)

intents.name: find_atm
examples: Where can I withdraw cash nearby?
Find the closest ATM to my address
Where is the nearest cash machine?
Nearest ATM branch for my bank
Locate ATM using my current location
Is there an ATM in this area?
ATM near me that accepts deposits
Find nearest ATM that dispenses cash
